algorithm_technique: Use a hash map to store cell values and parse formulas for evaluation.
problem_summary_simple: Design a spreadsheet that supports setting, resetting, and evaluating cell values, including simple addition formulas.
problem_summary_technical: Employ a hash map to store cell values, parsing formulas to retrieve cell references or integer values for calculation.
space_complexity: O(N), where N is the number of cells set
key_insights: A defaultdict simplifies handling uninitialized cells by defaulting to 0.
Parsing the formula string to identify cell references and integer operands is crucial.
The lookup for cell values in the hash map is O(1) on average.
